page.title: 11HOUSES
page.content: Most houses in our Domesday block are semi-detached. Most are in the south east square. The majority of the houses are gas centrally heated although a few use electricity or oil. Nearly all the house are owner occupied and are less than 30 years old. There are many new estates. The average in family is 4. Most have at least one car. About 30% have double glazing. About 20% are council owned.Over 50% of the people were born in the Cheltenham area.Most people have lived in their houses for 7-15 years, and many for 2-6 years. There were fewer longer residents except in the older village areas like Staverton. A survey showed (70homes) under4(18people)>11(37)>16(16) <29(35) >44(61)>60(27)60+(23).About 50% of homes had pets(1ormore) .Dogs(42) cats (22)rodents,fish,birds were others.
